title: The Prince of Orange his declaration shewing the reasons why he invades England : with a short preface, and some modest remarks on it.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
notes: "The declaration of ... William ... Prince of Orange" p. 4-14.
"Animadversions upon the Declaration of His Highness the Prince of Orange" p. 19-32.
Burnet was responsible for the text of William's declaration. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
